pr_title: [Communication]: Add Identifier surfix to all identifier classes in communication-common

timeline.bodyText: Is this changing in Java too? There it would need changes to Chat as well, since the ChatBuilder.credential takes CommunicationUser

replies.bodyText:
Yes. The same change is happening in Java as well. c.f.
